mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(user_id, email, password, user_age, user_name, tel, gender, region_id, user_profile_pic) VALUES(#{userId},#{email},#{password},#{userAge},#{userName},#{tel},#{gender},#{regionId},#{userProfilePic});
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET email = #{email}, password = #{password}, user_age = #{userAge}, user_name = #{userName}, tel = #{tel}, gender = #{gender}, region_id = #{regionId}, user_profile_pic = #{userProfilePic} WHERE user_id = #{userId};
